headline: AT&T Diversity Lawsuit Puts Governance And Valuation In Investor Focus
summary: New York City pension funds have filed a lawsuit against AT&T (NYSE:T) over the company’s decision not to allow a shareholder vote on a workforce diversity disclosure proposal. The case centers on whether investors can require AT&T to provide more detailed reporting on the composition of its workforce and related diversity metrics. The legal action, brought by major public pension funds, focuses on corporate governance, ESG practices, and shareholder rights at one of the largest U.S. telecom...
